analysis.description:
NATVCoin.contribute (/unique_chucks/10/0xd8b81c3f6ed4aef077155ddff2c61ca4e447407c.sol#220-263) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! _sender.send(refundAmount) (/unique_chucks/10/0xd8b81c3f6ed4aef077155ddff2c61ca4e447407c.sol#246-248)

NATVCoin.payOut (/unique_chucks/10/0xd8b81c3f6ed4aef077155ddff2c61ca4e447407c.sol#291-298) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! beneficiary.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/10/0xd8b81c3f6ed4aef077155ddff2c61ca4e447407c.sol#294-295)
